snippet: A last-minute goal by Adam Wisniewski gave Poland a 26-25 victory over Russia at the men’s world handball championships in Qatar.
lead_paragraph: A last-minute goal by Adam Wisniewski gave Poland a 26-25 victory over Russia at the men’s world handball championships in Qatar.

headline.main: Late Goal Lifts Poland Over Russia in Handball
headline.print_headline: Late Goal Lifts Poland Over Russia
